description: This file defines several data models for different vector index configurations used in a vector database, including IVFFLAT, IVF_PQ, HNSWFlat, and HNSWPQ, utilizing Pydantic for data validation.

classes.name: Ivfflat
classes.description: Configuration model for IVFFLAT index with parameters like number of lists, probes, and metric type.

classes.name: IvfPQ
classes.description: Configuration model for IVF_PQ index with parameters including subquantizers and bits per index.

classes.name: HNSWFlat
classes.description: Configuration model for HNSW index with parameters like neighbors, ef_construction, ef_search, and metric type.

classes.name: HNSWPQ
classes.description: Configuration model for HNSW with product quantization, including sub-quantizers, bits, and search parameters.
